thread.title: Coronation Street viewers left bemused as Leanne Battersby gives birth in a lift… but there’s no sign of the baby’s umbilical cord
thread.title_full: Coronation Street viewers left bemused as Leanne Battersby gives birth in a lift… but there’s no sign of the baby’s umbilical cord

author: jrobinson
title: Coronation Street viewers left bemused as Leanne Battersby gives birth in a lift… but there’s no sign of the baby’s umbilical cord
text:
TV Magazine Who cut it? Coronation Street viewers left bemused as Leanne Battersby gives birth in a lift… but there’s no sign of the baby’s umbilical cord 
Leanne went into labour while trapped in a lift with sister Toyah By JILL ROBINSON, SHOWBIZ REPORTER 20th February 2017, 9:52 pm CORONATION Street viewers were left baffled on Monday night after Leanne Battersby appeared to give birth to a baby without an umbilical cord. 
The character – played by Jane Danson – went into labour while trapped in a lift with sister Toyah , but with no sign of the jammed doors being opened any time soon, Leanne gave birth on the floor. ITV 6 Toyah shouted for help but no one could get the doors opened 
Toyah scooped the baby up and placed it in her sibling’s arms, before paramedics were finally able to get into the lift to check on the new mum. 
But fans were quick to ask what had happened to a key stage of the post-labour process. 
One wrote on Twitter: “Um so who cut the umbilical cord? #coronationstreet”, while another added: “What did she use to cut the umbilical cord?!” 
6 Toyah had to support her sister through her contractions. 
A third was also puzzled, writing: “So who’s cut the cord and has she delivered the placenta?! #corrie”. 
The two women were trapped as Toyah’s phone didn’t work and Leanne didn’t have hers with her, so they had to rely on Robert Preston, who arrived to get the lift himself, to call for help. ITV 6 Leanne admitted she was scared about giving birth 
Leanne cried: “I’m not having a baby in this lift!” but it soon became apparent there was no other option, as no one could get the lift doors open. 
But as the contractions grew stronger and more frequent, Leanne leaned on her sister for support, admitting she was “scared”. ITV 
Leanne safely delivered her baby in the lift RELATED STORIES HEARTBREAKING Corrie's Michelle scatters baby Ruairi's ashes as actress Kym Marsh talks how difficult it was to film 'THINGS ARE HEATING UP' Bethany Platt's grooming storyline takes a darker turn ‘DADDY’S GIRL’ Shayne Ward cradles his baby daughter in an adorable new picture taken by his partner Sophie Austin I'M HUMBLED' Coronation Street's Bethany Platt thanks fans for support after harrowing scenes see her lose her virginity 
After crying out in pain and getting on all fours, the baby arrived. 
As Nick and her half-sister Eva finally reached the flats, they joined the crowd which had now formed outside of the lift. ITV 6 When the doors finally opened, Leanne’s partner Nick and the ambulance crew awaited her 
But Twitter couldn’t help but mock the scenes, with one writing: “Just out of interest… did toyah gnaw through the cord with her teeth?” while another joked: “Wow didn’t leanne do well giving birth! No umbilical cord either” alongside a crying with laughter emoji. ITV Leanne cradled her newborn baby as she sat on the lift floor
